Comment: Abilities: A0NI (Ancestors' Blessing), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: This hero takes reduced damage from piercing and magic attacks.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Reduce piercing damage by 10% and magic by 10%.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Reduce piercing damage by 20% and magic by 20%.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Reduce piercing damage by 30% and magic by 30%.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Reduce piercing damage by 40% and magic by 35%.
